scripts.post:new:
node -e "const tz='America/Indiana/Indianapolis'; const title=(process.env.npm_config_title||process.argv.slice(1).join(' ')||'untitled').trim(); const slug=title.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]+/g,'-').replace(/(^-|-$)/g,''); const category=(process.env.npm_config_category||'general').trim(); const cat=category.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]+/g,'-').replace(/(^-|-$)/g,''); if(!cat){console.error('category required'); process.exit(1);} const d=new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-CA',{timeZone:tz}).format(new Date()); const fs=require('fs'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync(`mkdir -p content/dispatch/${cat}`); const p=`content/dispatch/${cat}/${slug}.mdx`; const fm=`---
`+`title: "${title}"
`+`description: ""
`+`date: "${d}"
`+`slug: "${slug}"
`+`tags: []
`+`order: 999
`+`favorite: false
`+`---

`+`## intro

`; fs.writeFileSync(p,fm); console.log('Created',p);"
scripts.post:broadcast: dotenv -e .env.local -- node -e "const slug=process.argv[1]; if(!slug){console.error('Usage: npm run post:broadcast -- <slug>'); process.exit(1);} const base=process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL||'https://www.heyosj.com'; const key=process.env.BROADCAST_SECRET; if(!key){console.error('BROADCAST_SECRET missing'); process.exit(1);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync(`curl -i -L \"${base}/api/broadcast/${slug}?key=${key}\"`,{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.post:latest: dotenv -e .env.local -- node -e "(async()=>{ const fs=require('fs'), path=require('path'); const matter=require('gray-matter'); const base=(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL||'https://www.heyosj.com').replace(/\/$/,''); const key=process.env.BROADCAST_SECRET; if(!key){console.error('BROADCAST_SECRET missing'); process.exit(1);} const root=path.join('content','dispatch'); if(!fs.existsSync(root)){console.error('content/dispatch not found'); process.exit(1);} const list=(dir)=>fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true}).flatMap(e=>{const p=path.join(dir,e.name); return e.isDirectory()?list(p):( /\.(md|mdx)$/.test(e.name)?[p]:[] );}); const files=list(root).map(f=>({f, m: fs.statSync(f).mtimeMs})).sort((a,b)=>b.m-a.m); if(!files.length){console.error('No posts'); process.exit(1);} const latest=files[0].f; const raw=fs.readFileSync(latest, 'utf8'); const fm=(matter(raw).data)||{}; const baseName=path.basename(latest).replace(/\.(md|mdx)$/,''); let slug=fm.slug || baseName; slug=slug.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9-]+/g,'-').replace(/-+/g,'-').replace(/(^-|-$)/g,''); const url=base + '/api/broadcast/' + slug + '?key=' + encodeURIComponent(key); console.log('POST', url); const res=await fetch(url,{method:'POST'}); const text=await res.text(); console.log(res.status, text); })().catch(e=>{ console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
